com.epidemic_simulator

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epidemic_simulator.Person

  • public class Person
extends Object
    /** An object that represent a person and their health status.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean alive
      If this is set to true the person is alive, it's true by default.
      protected boolean canInfect
      If this is set to true the person has enough virus to infect other people in case they meet.
      boolean canMove
      If this is set to true the person is allowed to move, it's true by default.
      protected int daysSinceInfection
      The days since when this person was infected.
      protected int deathDay
      The number of the day in which this person will die.
      If this person will not die it is -1 by default.
      protected boolean immune
      If this is set to true the person is immune to the disease and can't be infected.
      protected boolean infected
      If this is set to true the person is infected and its disease status will be updated everyday.
      protected boolean symptoms
      If this is set to true the person is showing symptoms of the disease.
      protected int symptomsDevelopmentDay
      The number of the day in which this person will develop symptoms.
      If this person will not develop symptoms it is is -1 by default.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color getColor()
      Get the Color representing the health status of this person according to the project specs.
      boolean hasSymptoms()
      Get the symptoms flag.
      protected void infect(int symptomsRate, int deathRate, int incubation, int maxDayForSymptomsDevelopment, int healDay)
      This method effectively infect this Person.
      The person is infected by setting their infected to true.

      This method also decides the future development of the disease for this person.
      It will extract a booleans based on the symptomsRate and if it's true it will decide the day on which this person will develop symptoms.
      boolean isAlive()
      Get the alive flag.
      boolean isInfected()
      Get the infected flag.
      protected boolean tryInfect(int infectionRate, int symptomsRate, int deathRate, int incubation, int maxDayForSymptomsDevelopment, int healDay)
      This method is called every time an infected person and a not infected one meets.
      This method extract a boolean based on infectionRate, if it's true then it proceed to call infect(int, int, int, int, int)

    • Field Detail

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove
        If this is set to true the person is allowed to move, it's true by default.

      • alive

        protected boolean alive
        If this is set to true the person is alive, it's true by default.

      • infected

        protected boolean infected
        If this is set to true the person is infected and its disease status will be updated everyday.

      • canInfect

        protected boolean canInfect
        If this is set to true the person has enough virus to infect other people in case they meet.

      • symptoms

        protected boolean symptoms
        If this is set to true the person is showing symptoms of the disease.
        By default a person that has symptoms will not be able to move, and will consume more resources.

      • immune

        protected boolean immune
        If this is set to true the person is immune to the disease and can't be infected.
        NOTE: The fact that a person is immune doesn't necessarily mean that they're allowed to move.

      • daysSinceInfection

        protected int daysSinceInfection
        The days since when this person was infected.

      • symptomsDevelopmentDay

        protected int symptomsDevelopmentDay
        The number of the day in which this person will develop symptoms.
        If this person will not develop symptoms it is is -1 by default.
        See Also:
        symptoms

      • deathDay

        protected int deathDay
        The number of the day in which this person will die.
        If this person will not die it is -1 by default.
        See Also:
        alive

      • tryInfect

        protected boolean tryInfect(int infectionRate,
                            int symptomsRate,
                            int deathRate,
                            int incubation,
                            int maxDayForSymptomsDevelopment,
                            int healDay)
        This method is called every time an infected person and a not infected one meets.
        This method extract a boolean based on infectionRate, if it's true then it proceed to call infect(int, int, int, int, int)
        Parameters:
        infectionRate - The infection rate.
        symptomsRate - The symptoms rate.
        deathRate - The death rate.
        incubation - The number of incubation days.
        maxDayForSymptomsDevelopment - The max number of days for symptoms development.
        healDay - The number of days in which the disease will cure itself.
        Returns:
        true if this person gets infected, false otherwise
        See Also:
        infect(int, int, int, int, int)

      • infect

        protected void infect(int symptomsRate,
                      int deathRate,
                      int incubation,
                      int maxDayForSymptomsDevelopment,
                      int healDay)
        This method effectively infect this Person.
        The person is infected by setting their infected to true.

        This method also decides the future development of the disease for this person.
        It will extract a booleans based on the symptomsRate and if it's true it will decide the day on which this person will develop symptoms. If the extracted boolean is true it will also extract another boolean based on the deathRate and if it's true it will decide the day on which this person will die alive.
        Parameters:
        symptomsRate - the symptoms rate
        deathRate - the death rate
        incubation - the incubation
        maxDayForSymptomsDevelopment - the max day for symptoms development
        healDay - the heal day
